title: Chickpea Curry
ingredients: Cooked rice or naan bread for serving
instructions: In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat.
Add the chopped onion and minced garlic. Saut√© until the onion is translucent and fragrant.
Add the curry powder, cumin, turmeric, and paprika. Stir well to coat the onions and garlic with the spices.
Add the drained chickpeas, coconut milk, and diced tomatoes. Stir to combine.
Simmer the curry for about 15-20 minutes, allowing the flavors to develop and the sauce to thicken.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the chickpea curry over cooked rice or with naan bread.
Garnish with fresh cilantro or parsley, if desired.
